app.title: CodeVillage
app.desc:
CodeVillage is a platform for practicing competitive algorithmic programming.
We also organize frequent coding competitions.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique solution

fields.name: pid
fields.desc: id of problem for which solution has been submitted

fields.name: uid
fields.desc: id of the user who as submitted the solution

fields.name: ctype
fields.desc: whether the problem belongs to a competition (1) or not (0)

fields.name: status
fields.desc: status of solution returned after grading (AC - accepted, WA - wrong answer, TLE - time limit exceeded, IE - internal error)

fields.name: language
fields.desc: programming language in which the solution was submitted

fields.name: time
fields.desc: time taken by the solution to run

fields.name: detail_status
fields.desc: detailed status of solution returned after grading

fields.name: item
fields.desc: integer to identify the unique voted link

fields.name: user
fields.desc: username of the user who has voted

fields.name: item
fields.desc: integer to identify the unique clicked link

fields.name: user
fields.desc: username of the user who has clicked
